title: The Olive Tree Theatre
description: It's Ireland, 1955. Tony dreams of being a playwright; but Rose has news that's going to disrupt everything. Her sister Irene works as a hostess in a club in London - maybe she can help...This family saga weaves together the tales of three young people who cross the Irish Sea to London, each seeking the chance to begin a new life. The trials, tribulations and successes of the beautiful and talented sisters Irene and Rose, and the handsome young playwright Tony, are charted across five decades in the Bohemian world of artists, theatre and clubs in London's Soho.
author: Maureen Finucane
